statements.label: Statements
statements.tooltip: SQL statement <1>fingerprint</1>.<3/><4/>To view additional details of a SQL statement fingerprint, click this to open the Statement Details page.

txn.label: TXN Type
txn.tooltip: Type of transaction (implicit or explicit). Explicit transactions refer to statements that are wrapped by <1>BEGIN</1> and <3>COMMIT</3> statements by the client. Explicit transactions employ <5>transactional pipelining</5> and therefore report latencies that do not account for replication.<7/><8/>For statements not in explicit transactions, CockroachDB wraps each statement in individual implicit transactions.

diagnostics.label: Diagnostics
diagnostics.tooltip: Option to activate <1>diagnostics</1> for each statement. If activated, this displays the status of diagnostics collection (<3>WAITING FOR QUERY</3>, <5>READY</5>, OR <7>ERROR</7>).

retries.label: Retries
retries.tooltip: Cumulative number of <1>retries</1> of statements with this fingerprint within the last hour or specified time interval.

execution-count.label: Execution Count
execution-count.tooltip: Cumulative number of executions of statements with this fingerprint within the last hour or specified <1>time interval</1>.<3/><4/>The bar indicates the ratio of runtime success (gray) to <6>retries</6> (red) for the SQL statement fingerprint.

rows.label: Rows Affected
rows.tooltip: Average number of rows returned while executing statements with this fingerprint within the last hour or specified <1>time interval</1>.<3/><4/>The gray bar indicates the mean number of rows returned. The blue bar indicates one standard deviation from the mean.

latency.label: Latency
latency.tooltip: Average service latency of statements with this fingerprint within the last hour or specified time interval.<1/><2/>The gray bar indicates the mean latency. The blue bar indicates one standard deviation from the mean.
